text: yar valikettil irukkirarkalo avarkal vakkalikkappatta (ivvulaka) vetanaiyai allatu marumaiyai kanumvarai arrahmana avarkalukku avakacam kotukkiran; (avvaru kanum potu) evarutaiya vitu kettatu evarutaiya kuttam palahinamanatu enpatai tittamaka avarkal arintu kolvarkal" enru (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
